GER 101.courseDesc: Introductory German. Includes listening, reading, writing, and speaking. Entrance exam required.

GER 201.courseDesc: Intermediate German. Includes grammar review, listening, speaking, and reading. Recommended for students who wish to attain oral competence.

GER 310.courseDesc: This course provides advanced practice in written and oral communication, including journalistic, professional, and creative writing. Examines contemporary cultural contexts through media and news. Taught in German.

GER 320.fullName: Introduction to Language for the Professions
GER 320.courseDesc: This course provides an introduction to communication skills in areas such as contemporary business, health, and law in a culturally sensitive fashion. Taught in German.
GER 320.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

GER 330.courseDesc: This courses provides an introduction to the analysis of individual and collective identities, including issues of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, class, nationality, and religion. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in German.
GER 330.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

GER 340.courseDesc: This course provides an introduction to the analysis of power relations and issues of (in)equality rooted in contemporary political and socio-economic systems. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in German.
GER 340.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

GER 350.fullName: Introduction to Language, Media, and Society
GER 350.courseDesc: This course provides an introduction to the role of language and media in society, including sociolinguistics, gender, media studies, and communication. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in German.
GER 350.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

GER 410.courseDesc: German 410 provides advanced grammar instruction and fosters translation and communication skills within a contemporary cultural context. The content ofGER 410may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in German.
GER 410.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits
GER 410.prereqs: GER 310 [Min Grade C] and (GER 320 [Min Grade C] or GER 330 [Min Grade C] or GER 340 [Min Grade C] or GER 350 [Min Grade C])

GER 420.fullName: Advanced Studies in Language for the Professions
GER 420.courseDesc: This course provides advanced communication skills in areas such as contemporary business, health, and law in a culturally sensitive fashion. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in German.
GER 420.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

GER 430.fullName: Advanced Studies in Identities and Communities
GER 430.courseDesc: This course provides an advanced analysis of individual and collective identities, including issues of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, class, nationality, and religion. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in German.
GER 430.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

GER 440.fullName: Advanced Studies in Power and Resistance
GER 440.courseDesc: This course provides an advanced analysis of power relations and issues of (in)equality rooted in contemporary political and socio-economic systems. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in German.
GER 440.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

GER 450.fullName: Advanced Studies in Language, Media, and Society
GER 450.courseDesc: This course provides an advanced analysis of the role of language and media in society, including sociolinguistics, gender, media studies, and communication. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in German.
GER 450.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

GER I199.repeatStatus: Can be repeated multiple times for credit
